alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Marion; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer; Washington (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 8:15AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spencer, south central Shelby, northeastern Nelson, southwestern Anderson, northwestern Marion and central Washington Counties through 845 AM EST... At 814 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bardstown, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Shelby, northwestern Marion, southeastern Spencer, central Washington, northeastern Nelson and southwestern Anderson Counties, including the following locations... Wayside, Samuels Field Airport, Booker, Bellwood, Botland, Mooresville, Polin, Withrow, Johnsonville and Croakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Marion; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer; Washington
